description:
Tsuna is injured in his battle with Dendro Chilum. Ryohei heals his wound by burning it with his sun-class deathperation flames. One of the Sun`s attributes is known as “active factor.” Ryohei uses this to speed the natural healing process by several hundreds times. Meanwhile, Gamma, who had lost his previous battle, is spending his days in the corner of the hideout lost in liquor. The Phantom Knight visits him. What do the two talk about in the unfriendly atmosphere--? Meanwhile, as Tsuna and his friends make their way towards Irie, a boy dressed like a magician blocks their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 因縁の魔導師(マジシャン)
